sentences.en: An endorsement by the deawee is null and void.
Application acceptance , policy key - in, policy printing, policy binding up and endorsement administration.
sentences.cn: 负责受理投保书,录单, 保单打印及装订, 保单批改作业等.

sentences.en: Compulsory endorsement cardholder on the Credit card is highly recommended.
sentences.cn: 必须提供信用卡持有人之签名.

sentences.en: Ed : They still make bank . They get 1 ) endorsement 2 ) gigs worth millions.
sentences.cn: 艾德: 仍然可以海捞一票. 他们到处代言就可以赚好几百万.

sentences.en: He also has endorsement deal worth at least $ 20 million.
sentences.cn: 另外他还有至少2千万美元的广告合同.

sentences.en: It was hardly a ringing endorsement of what lay ahead.
sentences.cn: 这很难算得上是对面前形势的明确认同.

sentences.en: More and more researches on negotiable instrument endorsement are done recently.
sentences.cn: 目前针对票据背书的研究逐渐增多.

sentences.en: One to whom ownership of a negotiable document is transferred by endorsement.
sentences.cn: 法律文件的最后一页,当折叠时,它成了外边的一页并带有背书.

sentences.en: Please sign your name in the space marked for endorsement.
sentences.cn: 请在标明签署的地方签名.

sentences.en: That adds up to an endorsement of the status quo.
The cashier would not cash the check without an endorsement.
sentences.cn: 出纳员不会给未获批准的支票兑付现金.

sentences.en: The election victory is a clear endorsement of their policies.
sentences.cn: 竞选成功显然是对他们政策的支持。

sentences.en: The new design only received a lukewarm endorsement from head office.
sentences.cn: 新设计在总部反响平平.

sentences.en: The result is the clearest possible endorsement of that call.
sentences.cn: 或许,票数是对这番号召最有力的回应.

sentences.en: There should be no suggestion of endorsement of the product or the company by WHO.
sentences.cn: 世卫组织不得对任何产品或公司提供支持建议。

sentences.en: This is a powerful endorsement for his softer style of government.
sentences.cn: 这是对他的更温和的执政风格的强有力认可。

sentences.en: We are happy to give the product our full endorsement.
sentences.cn: 我们很高兴给予该产品完全的认可.

words.tran_cn: 支持，赞同（endorse的过去式）；批注（文件，公文等）
背书；认可；签署；赞同；在背面签名
认可，支持；[金融]背书；签注（文件）

trans.tran_cn: 赞同，支持，宣传，违章记录
trans.tran_en: An endorsement is a statement or action that shows you support or approve of something or someone
